item.description:
Update: 10/15/2012 - This event is no longer free!

Charge at the gate is $10 pp ($5 if you register in advance)  (Ages 0-14 free admission)

Please register here to obtain the $5 cheaper rate:

http://www.nashobawinery.com/

 

Regards,

Jonathan

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

BLUEGRASS & BREWS

Sunday, October 21, 2012

Noon - 5:00 p.m.

Welcome to Nashoba Valley Winery for one of everyone's favorite festivals of the fall season. This festival highlights the hand crafted micro-brewed beers of our brewer.   Relax, sit back, and enjoy some bluegrass music bySouthern Rai

l.  Stroll by the pavilion, visit JAAS snack shack to purchase a cider donut or a caramel apple, savor the smells of our barbecue provided by the chef’s from our restaurant, J’s. And finally, we invite you to take a tour of our winery or simply taste many of our award winning wines.

 

SOUTHERN RAIL

 

Southern Rail’s music is high energy exuberant fun, with riveting harmonies, irreverent humor and sparkling banjo and mandolin solo work.  Their songs have graced Bluegrass Unlimited’s Top Thirty Singles Chart receiving heavy national airplay.  Southern Rail has a loyal fan base that makes every concert an event that the whole family can enjoy.

So relax, put down your blanket and enjoy the music.
item.how_to_find_us: We will try to corral a large number of tables together. Look for the Wedeln Banner - and Arrive Early! It gets packed very quickly
item.name: Nashoba Valley Winery - Bluegrass and Brews Festival
